ClientController - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Controller
This controller is Client Side This class handles all type of messages: - it forwards to the server the ones sent by the client side - it receives the ones arriving from the server side and it forwards them to the client's view
ClientController(View) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.ClientController
 
connectClientToServer(String, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.ClientController
Method to create the client's socket and connect it to the server, if the ip and port matches with the server's ones The parameters ip and port are already previously checked
createConnection(Map<String, String>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.ClientController
Method that creates a connection with the IP Address and the port number given by the client
